name: TimeToSplit
description:
How to play?

you need to use the arrow key to move the platform! This game is like " Breakout atari " :)

How many levels?

150+ Levels

2 Game Modes

I can personalize the objects?

Of course! :)

9+ Different platforms

9+ Different Balls

Future Update?

Yes! This is only the first version, i have very much ideas for this game
